content: welcome to my ziva mesh top this is a fluffy single-strand lace mohair top with a straightforward construction perfect for advanced beginners it uses a single thread of lace mohair yarn and a 10 mm crochet hook so it ll require a little bit of patience but it ll be worth it i promise skill level advanced beginners knowledge of basic stitches simple techniques and working with thin yarn supplies needed - 10 mm crochet hook - lace yarn i ve used friends kid silk from hobbii 72% mohair 25% silk 3% wool in colourway maroon 49 for size s 3 balls or a bit more than 50 gr or 400 meters of yarn - scissors - tape measure - yarn needle - stitch markers gauge swatch 5 x 5 = 10 sts x 7 row alternating double_crochet and single_crochet row if you prefer visual guidance you can find the video tutorial on my youtube channel here 1 ★this pattern is made to measure it requires the use of a tape measure and few calculations it doesn t provide a specific stitch count for each size as i believe everyone has a different and unique body i designed it to be completely made to measure and suitable for everyone no matter what size gender and body shape however it is true that each body is different and there may be variations in how the pattern fits from person to person ps i ve created the design from start to end so please don t copy that by purchasing you agree not to distribute the pattern in any way for free or for sale if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished products as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer on your social media and provide a link to my shop if you re selling online if you have any doubts or questions feel free to contact me check out my website https //bloodimaryart com or follow me here → instagram https //www instagram com/bloodimaryart/ → facebook https //www facebook com/bloodimaryart → pinterest https //www pinterest com/bloodimaryart → tik tok https //www tiktok com/@bloodimaryart → youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucpmtxpub4a39ua8vsbyd0jq ★ if you wish to receive email updates regarding my new patterns discount codes and sales join my mailing list here https //mailchi mp/e0edd1d92d67/sign-up-form ★ thanks for visiting my shop 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=e5es_rezszc
